simplesect.title: NAME
simplesect.simpara: git-update-server-info - Update auxiliary info file to help dumb servers

simplesect.title: DESCRIPTION
simplesect.simpara: A dumb server that does not do on-the-fly pack generations must have some auxiliary information files in $GIT_DIR/info and $GIT_OBJECT_DIRECTORY/info directories to help clients discover what references and packs the server has. This command generates such auxiliary files.

listitem.simpara: Update the info files from scratch.
